Hero.subtitle: Vernacular voice assistant that simplifies patient data entry, follow-up scheduling, and health scheme information for ASHA workers in rural communities.
Hero.voiceDataEntryDesc: Register patients and update records using simple voice commands.
Hero.aiAssistanceDesc: Get intelligent insights for patient care and follow-ups.
Hero.securePrivateDesc: Patient data protected with enterprise-grade security.
Hero.digitalRecordsDesc: Access complete patient history with QR code system.
Hero.youtube_text: How to use: click here to learn

Features.subtitle: Our AI-powered platform transforms how ASHA workers serve their communities with efficient data management and intelligent health insights.
Features.voiceRegistrationDesc: Register patients using simple voice commands in local language.
Features.smartFollowupDesc: Automated appointment tracking and reminder system.
Features.healthSchemeDesc: Easy access to government health schemes and benefits.
Features.communityDashboardDesc: Track community health metrics and outcomes.

CTA.subtitle: Our AI platform helps ASHA workers with voice-based patient registration, digital health records, and automated follow-ups simultaneously. Get instant insights and improve healthcare delivery in rural communities.
CTA.voiceDataEntryDesc: Register patients and update health records using simple voice commands in local language.
CTA.smartFollowupsDesc: Automated appointment scheduling and reminders for better patient care continuity.
CTA.healthSchemesDesc: Easy access to government health benefits and scheme information for communities.
CTA.noCreditCard: No credit card required • 14-day free trial • Cancel anytime

About.description: The world's first AI platform specifically designed for ASHA workers. Manage patient data, schedule follow-ups, and access health schemes with voice commands in local languages.
About.voiceBasedInterfaceDesc: Register patients and update records using simple voice commands in vernacular languages.
About.healthIntelligenceDesc: AI models that understand healthcare workflows and provide intelligent recommendations.
About.communityAnalyticsDesc: Track health trends, vaccination rates, and community health outcomes automatically.
About.vernacularAIModelsDesc: Specialized AI models trained on healthcare data and local languages for superior understanding.
About.healthcareSecurityDesc: Bank-level encryption and compliance with healthcare data protection standards and regulations.
About.healthDatabaseDesc: Comprehensive database of health schemes, protocols, and community health records.
About.ashaWorkersDesc: Streamline patient registration, reduce paperwork, and improve healthcare delivery efficiency.
About.healthCentersDesc: Access comprehensive community health data and track public health programs effectively.
About.maternalHealthcareDesc: Monitor pregnancy progress, schedule antenatal checks, and reduce maternal mortality.
About.childHealthcareDesc: Track immunization schedules, nutrition status, and child development milestones.
About.joinThousands: Join thousands of ASHA workers and healthcare professionals who've revolutionized their workflow with AI-powered health assistance.

Footer.description: The next-generation AI-powered health assistant that helps ASHA workers manage patient data, schedule follow-ups, and access health schemes with voice commands in local languages.
Footer.trustedBy: Trusted by ASHA workers and healthcare professionals

AshaCenters.title: ASHA Centers Across
AshaCenters.subtitle: Discover our network of ASHA centers serving rural communities with healthcare services and support.

ChatBot.headerSubtitle: Ask me about nearest centers in any language
ChatBot.inputPlaceholder: Type your message or use voice...
ChatBot.supportedLanguages: Supports multiple languages including Hindi, Tamil, Marathi, Bengali
ChatBot.welcomeMessage: Hello! I can help you find nearest ASHA centers.
ChatBot.errorMessage: I apologize, but I'm having trouble processing your request. Please try again.
ChatBot.welcomeEnglish: Hello! I'm your ASHA assistant. I can help you find the nearest ASHA centers, provide information about healthcare services, or answer your questions. How can I assist you today?
ChatBot.welcomeHindi: नमस्ते! मैं आपकी ASHA सहायक हूं। मैं आपको नजदीकी ASHA केंद्र खोजने, स्वास्थ्य सेवाओं के बारे में जानकारी प्रदान करने, या आपके प्रश्नों के उत्तर देने में मदद कर सकती हूं। आज मैं आपकी कैसे सहायता कर सकती हूं?
ChatBot.welcomeTamil: வணக்கம்! நான் உங்கள் ASHA உதவியாளன். அருகிலுள்ள ASHA மையங்களைக் கண்டுபிடிக்கும், சுகாதார சேவைகள் பற்றிய தகவல்களை வழங்கும், அல்லது உங்கள் கேள்விகளுக்கு பதிலளிக்கும் என்னை உதவும். இன்று நான் உங்களுக்கு எவ்வாறு உதவ முடியும்?
ChatBot.welcomeMarathi: नमस्कार! मी तुमची ASHA सहाय्यक आहे. मी तुम्हाला जवळची ASHA केंद्रे शोधण्यात, आरोग्यसेवा माहिती पुरवण्यात किंवा तुमच्या प्रश्नांची उत्तरे देण्यात मदत करू शकते. आज मी तुमची कशी मदत करू शकते?
ChatBot.welcomeBengali: হ্যালো! আমি আপনার ASHA সহায়ক। আমি আপনাকে নিকটতম ASHA কেন্দ্র খুঁজে পেতে, স্বাস্থ্য সেবা সম্পর্কে তথ্য প্রদান করতে, বা আপনার প্রশ্নের উত্তর দিতে সাহায্য করতে পারি। আজ আমি আপনাকে কিভাবে সাহায্য করতে পারি?
ChatBot.nearestCentersEnglish: Here are the nearest ASHA centers to your location:
ChatBot.moreInfoQuestionEnglish: Would you like more information about any of these centers?
ChatBot.moreInfoQuestionHindi: क्या आप इनमें से किसी केंद्र के बारे में अधिक जानकारी चाहते हैं?
ChatBot.moreInfoQuestionTamil: இந்த மையங்களில் ஏதேனும் ஒன்றைப் பற்றிய கூடுதல் தகவலை விரும்புகிறீர்களா?
ChatBot.moreInfoQuestionMarathi: तुम्हाला यापैकी कोणत्याही केंद्राबद्दल अधिक माहिती हवी आहे का?
